item.title: The Pi1M Training Programme offered by Digi provides benefits to small business owners
item.description: Source: Digi. Participants of the Pi1M Training Programme gathered for a group photo. Digi Telecommunications recently conducted a training program for community members residing near the company-managed Pusat Internet 1 Malaysia (Pi1M) centers. This tailored program reflects Digi’s commitment to fostering online entrepreneurship within its Pi1M communities. Currently, Digi manages 34 Pi1Ms across Pahang, Kelantan, Terengganu, Johor, Melaka, and Sarawak, with plans to establish 70 more centers by year’s end.
